page.title: 02Farming , Helford area
page.content: ARABLE & STOCK There are several farms in the area ranging from 40 to 600 acres.The dairy herds are mostly Frisian cattle as they are both high yielding and good for beef.The main beef bullocks are Hereford X and there South Devons,excellent dual purpose animals.Pigs (intensive),sheep and poultry are also kept. The main crops are winter and spring barley, brocolli, potatoes, cabbage, fodder peas,turnips and oil seed rape.Extensive grass for grazing,hay and sillage ( clamp and big bale in plastic bags). HORTICULTURE Small scale(13 acres) soft fruit,runner beans,lettuce, anemones and sweetcorn. FLOWER FARMING 150 acres Daffodils FISHING Several local boats. Numerous fish,crabs and oysters.
